mdRecord.dcterms:title: Drafting the Declaration of Independence: the Committee, Franklin, Jefferson, Adams, Livingston & Sherman / from the original painting by Chappel in the posession of the publishers
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 18 x 14 cm. on sheet 28 x 21 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Image: The Committee at work, with Franklin standing on one side of a table facing the other committee members, two of whom are seated with papers in hand.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Gift of Albert and Shirley Small, June, 2005.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Franklin, Benjamin, 1706-1790--Portraits
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Portraits
Adams, John, 1735-1826--Portraits
Livingston, Robert R, 1746-1813--Portraits
Sherman, Roger, 1721-1793--Portraits
United States. Continental Congress.
United States.--Declaration of Independence
